de.wortschatz.hbase

Class EmigrationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.wortschatz.hbase.EmigrationManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CooccurrenceEmigrationManager, SentenceEmigrationManager, SourceEmigrationManager, WordEmigrationManager

    public abstract class EmigrationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that manages the migration of a SQl database to an HBase table

      An instance of SqlDataGetter to manage retrieving Data from an SQL Database

      The name of the HBase table the Data will be migrated to

      • migrateTuple

        protected void migrateTuple(java.lang.String query,
                            java.lang.String column_family,
                            java.lang.String qualifier,
                            java.lang.String value_class)
        Migrate a list of data tuples from SQL DB to HBase. This is done by splitting the data into chunks of 10000 rows.
        Parameters:
        query - Query to return a list of data tuples. The first two selected values are stored in each tuple
        column_family - The column family where tuple data will be stored
        qualifier - The column qualifier, If blank the first tuple value will be used (must be of type String)
        value_class - The class the second value whill be cast to (string, int, float, long)
